name: AI Anomaly
description: When scientists succeed in creating super smart machines, the machines turn on their creators and threaten the future of mankind. Only one plucky blue robot can save them in this twenty-level action packed platformer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP, 32 or 64 bit Processor: 1 GHz + Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 341 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: XBox 360, Logitech F310, and Steam Controllers supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP, 32 or 64 bit Processor: 1 GHz +, multicore Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: XBox 360, Logitech F310, and Steam Controllers supported
